mapper.sql: select (select NAME from CUSTOMER where CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER = RESERVATION.CUSTOMER) AS CUSTOMERNAME, (select TEL from CUSTOMER where CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER = RESERVATION.CUSTOMER) AS TEL, (select NAME from PAT where PAT.PAT = RESERVATION.PAT) AS PATNAME, TYPE, STARTDTTM, ENDDTTM, REGDTTM, MEMO, (CASE WHEN NOW() BETWEEN STARTDTTM AND ENDDTTM THEN 'S' -- 현재 시간이 예약 기간 내에 있을 경우 WHEN STARTDTTM > NOW() THEN 'R' -- 현재 시간이 예약 시작 시간보다 빠를 경우 WHEN NOW() > ENDDTTM THEN 'E' -- 현재 시간이 예약 종료 시간보다 늦을 경우 END) AS STATUS from RESERVATION
mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION( CUSTOMER, PAT, TYPE, STARTDTTM, ENDDTTM, REGDTTM, MEMO ) values ( #{customer}, #{pat}, #{type}, #{startDttm}, #{endDttm}, NOW(), #{memo})
mapper.select: where CURDATE() BETWEEN DATE(STARTDTTM) AND DATE(ENDDTTM)
select TYPE, count(*) AS NUM from RESERVATION where MONTH(STARTDTTM) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) group by TYPE

select A.TYPE, (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN A.CNT > 1 THEN A.CUSTOMER END) * 100.0) / COUNT(DISTINCT A.CUSTOMER) AS RATE from ( SELECT CUSTOMER, TYPE, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RESERVATION GROUP BY CUSTOMER, TYPE ) A GROUP BY A.TYPE
